unnormalised: Boro, bill-amcho payment, mhunnlear borem? Konnakuch tem korunk *avoddona*, punn bhai, divo uzvadd dourunk zai, khorench! Ani aizkal, soglle online astana, tem sokallekui sopem ani kiteak torui odik gundalleachem zata.
normalised: Baraabar, bill payment-aam, mhunnlyaari zaalen? Konnakuch te korunk avoddona, punn bhai, uzo sambhallonk zai, khoreponnanuch! Ani aazkaal, sogllem online asa, ten'na te soppei ani kiteak tori oddchonnichem-ui zata.

unnormalised: Plea mhoineak, udahoronnak, hanv Adani Electricity-chem mojea vijechem bill pollet ravtalom - Rs. 3,450.75, puroponnim sangta. Sogleach vellar hanv AC choloinam! Ani tacho bibra…visrun voch. "Fixed Charges: ₹250," "Energy Charges: ₹2,800," "Fuel Adjustment Cost: ₹400.75," ani ani her choddxe vostu zaka hanv samkemuch somzona. Mhunnlear, "FAC" mhunnlear *kiteak*? Tem ek fuel surcharge bhaxen asa vo kiteak?
normalised: Fattachea mhoinneak, udahoronnak, Adani Electricity-chi mazi light-bill, rupea tin hazar charxim panchvis point satt ponchavis, thik thak, aami pollot ravle. Hanv soputh ghetam, hanv A-C itlem chalu korinashe! Ani break-down… soddun di. "Fixed Charges: rupia donxim panchvis," "Energy Charges: rupea don hazar axttaxim," "Fuel Adjustment Cost: rupea charxim point satt ponchavis," ani ani-i zaite vostu jim mhaka somzonkuch nakaat mhunn hanv natak kortam. Mhakka zai, "F-A-C" mhunnlyaari kitem? Tem fuel surcharge vori asa vo kitem?

unnormalised: Uprant Mumbai Municipal Corporation-achem udkachem bill asa. Tem ek khell asa; sodanch Rs. 700 - Rs. 800 aspas cholta. Tankam khorench amchea ilakeantlim pipe-am samballunk zai; udkachi dabdabi itli unni asta ki oddech fautim!
normalised: Uprant Mumbai Municipal Corporation-chi udkachi bill asa. Tem eka mazak vori asa; sadaroponnan rupea satxim vo rupea axttaxim okolo-pakolo ravta. Tannim amchea illakeantlea pipe-line thik korunk zai; udkachi dab sadhe-sadhe vatten thoddi asta!

unnormalised: Mojea JioFiber-achem bill deiv diun nirdharit asta – Rs. 699 dor mhoineak (GST soddun). Hanv itshetam sogllim bill hanstech asunk zai mhunn. Tori, hanv ugddas korta tedna 1GB data-k Rs. 250 poddta asli! Kitem vellar bodol zala, eh?
normalised: Mazi J-i-o-Fiber-chi bill deva barren nirdharit asa – rupia soxim ekaunnonnvis dor mhoinneak (G-S-T soddun). Mhaka zai soklli bills itli saroll asli mhunn. Tori astanaa, mhaka ugddas asa je eka G-B data-k rupea donxim panchvis lagta asli! Kitli vatt bodol’li, naai?

unnormalised: Ani gas bill-acher mhaka suru korunk di naka. Indraprastha Gas Ltd (IGL) hanv vhoddponn zatam tatunche tegnen tim kimot bodolta ravta! Ek mhoineak tem ₹900, dusrea mhoineak tem ₹1100. Hea darant, hanv mojea aji bhaxen chulhea cher randunk suru korcho poddtolo!
normalised: Ani gas-chi bill-aacher mhaka survat korunk di naka. Indraprastha Gas L-t-d (I-G-L) mhaka lagunk lagata thoddi vellar porvor korun kimot bodoltai! Eka mhoinneak rupea novxim asta, dusrea mhoinneak rupea ek hazar ekaxttaxtim asta. He rate-acher, mhaka mazi aaze vorti chullher randunk poddteli!

unnormalised: Heo vostu bhortalen tedna dukh dit aasilem. Ugddas asa vijechem bill bhortoleak BEST depot-an linin ubhem ravtalet? Vo cheque postant ghallun tem harouna mhunn axen astale? Naka mhaka!
normalised: Hem sogllem bhortolem tedna kitelem tras jatalem. Ugddas asa B-E-S-T depot-an line-n ubhem ravun light bill bhortam asle? Vo check post-an pathoun tem poddonk diinam mhunn asa ghetam? Dhanyavaad nam!

unnormalised: Atam, hanv lagbag soglleak PhonePe vaparta. QR code scan kor, rakom bhorti kor, ani zalam. Hanv JioFiber bill-ak auto-pay vaparta, mhunnlear mhaka kednach tachi chinta korchi poddona. Tori astana, eka fauttim hanven chukon Rs. 699 chukon Rs. 6,990 auto-pay korunk set kelem! Kallzak kiteak torui zatolem te vixim uloitat!
normalised: Aaz, hanv PhonePe vaportam almost sogllea vostunchea khatir. Q-R code scan kar, amount bhorti kar ani zaalem. Hanv auto-pay-i vaportam J-i-o-Fiber-chea bill-aachea khatir, ten'na mhaka tanki vixim chintunk poddona. Punn, hanv eka vatten rupia so hazar novxim novvonvis auto-pay khatir mandun dil'le rupia soxim ekaunnonnvis bhortonk asle! Kalliz utlun gel'lem vori dislem mhaka.

unnormalised: Punn moji aai, ti old school-ichi asa. Ti sogllem offline bhortok zata mhunn tika avoddta. Hanven tika Paytm koxem vaprunk zata mhunn dakhoilem, punn tika tem samkemuch somzonam. BigBasket-antle 50 kgs kande order korun tinnem sampoilem!
normalised: Mazi aai, ti tor purnnea riti-chich zavn asa. Ti sogllem offline-an bhorti korun avodtta. Hanv tika P-a-y-T-m koxem vaprunk zata mhunn dakhoitol'lem, punn tika tem zomlechna. Te BigBasket-an fifty kilogram kannde order kele!

unnormalised: Tor, kiteak mhunnlear borem? Bill-am ek gorjechi vaitt vostu, punn teknoloji sodanch tim bhortoleak thoddi unni dukh dita. Punn hanv axetam vijechea company-amnim tea gundalleachea "charges" koxe dharta mhunn odik nitall ravonk zai. Khorench, Rs. 50-k "meter rent" kiteak?! Ani tem dor mhoineak kiteak halta?!
normalised: Ten'na kitem siklea? Bills eka vaitt vostu zavn asa, punn technology-n tankam bhortolem thoddem tori komi trasachem kela. Punn mhaka dista he light company-n tankanchea mysterious "charges" koxem calculate kortat ten vixim vegllench ulounk zai. Khorench, rupia panchvisancho "meter rent" mhunnlyaari kitem?! Ani tem kiteak dor mhoinneak bodolta!

unnormalised: Fuddlea mhoineak, hanv solar power-cher bodol zatam mhunn axetam. Lamb velar tem borem bhandvol zanvchem, khas korun he vijeche kimot utorun voir veta tedna! Uprant, mhaka solar panel samballpache cost-ache dukh zauche poddteli... sodanch Rs. 500/mhoino? Dusrem bill, dusri bhonvdde, mhunn hanv sangtam!
normalised: Fuddlea mhoinneak, hanv solar power-ak bodlunchem chintam. Tem lambvellek borem guntovnnuk zait, kiteak mhunnlear light-achi kimot akaxak lagta mhunn. Uprant, mhaka solar panel-anchi maintenance cost-achi chinta korunk poddteli... rupia panchxim dor mhoinneak? Dusri bill, dusri odvednyi, mhaka dista!
